name: Five Nights At Damian's
description:
The game takes some time to load. Please be patient. Thank you :3

The controls are the same as in FnaF.

Warning: Leaving the game will not save your proguess

You can beat the game in one sitting :v

Help wanted!

My family and I are going on a vacation. We need someone who can watch our house. Please call this number: (223) 985-4347

Pls help :(
